php.LBL_NO_SERVICE_CONTRACTS_IN_HELPDESK: Le ticket n'est pas lié à un contrat de service

php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_CREATE:
We received your message and it will soon be processed.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_CLOSED:
Our experts have resolved your ticket. Below you can find detailed information about the work we performed.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_MODIFICATION:
Our specialists are working on your ticket.
If you have any additional information or questions, please reply to this email. In order to preserve continuity of email correspondence, please do not remove the ticket number from the email subject.
php.LBL_MAIL_NOTICE_OWNER_CREATED: Un nouveau ticket a été créé. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations ci-dessous:
php.LBL_CHILD_RECORDS: Enregistrements enfants au ticket en cours
php.LBL_MASS_STATUS_UPDATED: Statut mis à jour dans les enregistrements sélectionnés
php.LBL_ADD_TIME_CONTROL: Ajouter le temps de travail avant de fermer le ticket
php.LBL_CLOSE_RELATED_TICKETS: Avant de fermer ce billet, fermez les tickets connexes
